Constructor Detail

Game

public Game(java.lang.String playername,
            java.awt.Dimension resolution)
Simple Gameconstructor, which sets default values for SHOT, PLAYERSPEED and level

Parameters:
playername - name of the player
resolution - resolution of the enviroment

Game

public Game(java.lang.String playername,
            java.awt.Dimension resolution,
            int speed,
            int startLevel)
Enhanced constructor, which also sets the speed and the startlevel

Parameters:
playername - name of the player
resolution - resolution of the enviroment
speed - playerspeed & half of shotspeed
startLevel - level on which the game starts
Method Detail

run

public boolean run(int deltaAlignment,
                   boolean forward,
                   boolean shoot)
moves the game one step forward, handles gameover and userinput

Parameters:
deltaAlignment - alignmentchange of player (negative is turn to left, positive is right)
forward - true if the player should move forward
shoot - true if the player shoots
Returns:
true if the game is over

handleUserInput

                             boolean forward,
                             boolean shoot)
handles the userinput

Parameters:
deltaAlignment - alignmentchange of player (negative is turn to left, positive is right)
forward - true if the player should move forward
shoot - true if the player shoots

handleObjects

public java.util.ArrayList<SpaceObject> handleObjects(java.util.ArrayList<SpaceObject> objects)
handles objects, so deletes them if they should be deleted, all changes are made recursively

Parameters:
objects - the objects which should be handled
Returns:
the rest of the objects which shouldn't be deleted

Parameters:
remainingPoints - the remaining points
times - the parts on which the points should be spread
